definitions.text: sadness associated with some wrong done or some disappointment
examples: he drank to drown his sorrows
he wrote a note expressing his regret
to his rue, the error cost him the game

definitions.text: feel remorse for; feel sorry for; be contrite about
feel sad about the loss or absence of

examples: I regret I can't come to the party
I regret to say that you did not gain admission to Harvard
